thinkingThat these nights when we were drinking No they never got us anywhere, no This is because I can spell konfusion with a K And I can like it It's to dying in anothers armsand why i had to try it Because we all need a little more roomTo live...My Konstantine. this is what happens when you are bored on a rainy day...thinking...waiting...

Do you ever have those conversations with people that bring up really bad memories? last night i was talking to kuhn about alot of shit and i ended up just spewing everything i hate about myself to her. i feel bad for her, i would have punched me in the face. But you figure the candy coating has to come off sometime. i dont know my mind is really weird right now, thinking about my past and how far it seems i have come. but really in one night just talking about it kind of puts me right back where i was. its so hard to explain, and figuring mike is the only one who reads this...there is no need to explain bc he knows. however, wow, i dont know...
i had milk and chilli for lunch today.

I don't think i could be happier at this point in my life... well actually if i were going to Warped...but, cant have everything, otherwise we'd all be living in bliss. however back to the real world...i have white spots on my throat. I am going to the doctor in T-3 hours.
this speech is my recital i think its very vital to rock around thats right on time its TRICKYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY!

so today is an alright time...i started pilatis (sp?) yesterday and thats fun. dave says im trendy for it...well fuckin sweet. its interesting how quickly we all want to grow up...im not trying to be insightful or anything right now...god knows im not like that. however, isnt it funny to think about how peoples morals are just thrown away in the matter of a drunken second? why does everyone have to do that so recently? like it makes you more grown up or experienced? fuck it, its ok to be in a club on my own. its funny how everyone always talks about wanting to be different. because HOLY SHIT having sex is a different thing to do. BY GOD NO ONE HAS EVER DONE THAT BEFORE. not to say im not going to have sex...bc well...we all know my feelings on that. you want to be so different and respected...but go on and degrade yourself some more...go on and fuck someone...anyone, because sex doesnt mean anything...right? giving away the one thing that was meant to be sacred and used in a state of love is nothing...am i right? i dont think so. dont worry D...i got big plans for ya.

Well the 4th was a trip. my parents have been gone so its like pretty much whatever we do flies.... last night i was supposed to sleep over at krissys house but her and kuhn dissapeared when everyone was leaving so i just decided to leave...alot of fun that was. anywho so i got home and my brother was at the house with his gf....grrrrrrrreat. but i just yelled downstairs and said i was going outside...and hes like...for what? and i was drunk so i jsut ignored him and went outside. 2 minutes later he and lorie were outside and we all had a cig together...it was a bonding moment really bc he knew i was drunk and was making fun of me....so...sweeeeeeeet my family confuses me...and now to mow the lawn.

What's funny about this is that no one knows im blogging lately...its like the exact opposite of what people usually want. HA. fuck you all im blogging, bloggity sweet fucking blog! anyhow. last night was fun, i had a bbq, wondering why some people didnt come with others...even though i may have said i only wanted some people there, in the back of my head i really wanted others there too. oh well, ill see them tonight or tomorrow, hopefully tonight. i miss kat, i really do, i talked to her last night. i havent seen her in like 2 weeks. i miss her... i hope the used is good, even if other people dont like them, i still do. sometimes they put me in the best mood. i hate people to criticize (sp?wtf?) other peoples music...fuck you, find something useful to talk about, music is music...the way it makes you feel is something to talk about... penis...cock...........................wang...

Isnt it funny how your mind can change so quickly? ever since ive been back my whole mindset on life is different. i have my friends, mexicans and mexico in general to thank for that. im finally ok with being home, even if it took this long. but my life has to change. i want to be different. i have to live my life. so what i want to................?....................................... (in the wise words of kat)..................................................mmmmmmm...NAH! so from now on I'm doing what i want, without looking back, im going to act on what i feel and say what i would never normally say. thats it....here i go.... but first a shower.

So i just got back from MEXICO and i cant even take how much i miss it there. all the friends we made...and stuff like that just makes me insane thinking about it. it actually makes me sick to think how much fun i had there...im a changed woman completely...last year was awesome but this year we experienced so much more there are no words to describe it. i miss them... i miss the nights... i miss............................................carlos o'brians............. you can say you have been there and you miss it bc you get drunk there and shit like that...but when you actually gain friendships from the people that work there you would rather die than go home. GOING BACK IN OCTOBER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
